mapper.insert: insert into tbl_review (pk_review_no, fk_member_no, fk_trade_no, review_content, review_regdate, review_img_file_name, review_img_org_name) values (#{pk_review_no}, #{pk_member_no}, #{pk_trade_no}, #{review_content}, SYSDATE, #{review_img_file_name}, #{review_img_org_name})
insert into tbl_blacklist(pk_blacklist_no, fk_target_member_no, fk_member_no, blacklist_regdate) values(blacklist_seq.nextval, #{pk_target_member_no}, #{pk_member_no}, sysdate)
mapper.select: select pk_survey_no, survey_content, count(*) as count from v_review_survey_resp where fk_seller_no = #{pk_member_no} group by pk_survey_no, survey_content

select pk_review_no, fk_consumer_no, consumer_name, review_content, to_char(review_regdate, 'yyyy-mm-dd') as review_regdate, review_img_file_name from ( select rownum as rnum, a.* from ( select distinct pk_review_no, fk_consumer_no, consumer_name, review_content, review_regdate, review_img_file_name from v_review_survey_resp where fk_seller_no = #{pk_member_no} order by review_regdate desc ) a ) b where rnum between #{paging_dto.first_row} and #{paging_dto.last_row}

select distinct pk_review_no, fk_consumer_no, consumer_name, fk_seller_no, seller_name, pk_trade_no, review_content, review_img_file_name, review_img_org_name, product_title, review_regdate from v_review_survey_resp where pk_review_no = #{pk_review_no}
